meanings.definition: A receptacle in which the consecrated Host is exposed for adoration.
meanings.sent1: During the church service, the priest held up the beautiful monstrances for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: The golden monstrances gleamed in the sunlight as the faithful gathered for prayer.
meanings.sent3: The monstrances seemed to glow with a divine light, making the congregation feel at peace.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were drawn to the monstrances, as if they held the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the monstrances captured the attention of all who entered the church.

meanings.definition: A vessel in which the consecrated Host is exposed for veneration.
meanings.sent1: The priest carefully placed the sacred Host in the ornate monstrances for display.
meanings.sent2: The faithful knelt in reverence before the shimmering monstrances on the altar.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the sight of the monstrances, thinking they were like treasure chests.
meanings.sent4: The monstrances stood tall and proud, symbolizing the devotion of the worshippers.
meanings.sent5: The soft candlelight danced off the surface of the monstrances, creating a mesmerizing effect.
